<0>Tell us more about how it impacted yo: <0>Tell us more about how it impacted you.</0>
<0>What do you know about where the scam: <0>What do you know about where the scam came from?</0>
<0>What was the impact of the scam?</0>: <0>What was the impact of the scam?</0>
Any clues about the source of the scam c: Any clues about the source of the scam can help police track down the scammer.
Before you start, gather what you can ab: Before you start, gather what you can about the scam:
Details on where it came from: Details on where it came from
For example: the amount of money, the in: For example: the amount of money, the information taken, what else was affected
If you can, give us an idea of when the: If you can, give us an idea of when the scam took place so that police are able to look into it.
It’s okay if you don’t know exactly when: It’s okay if you don’t know exactly when it took place. You can give your best guess or leave this blank.
Provide your contact details so that we: Provide your contact details so that we can send you a confirmation of your report.
Remember to include any email addresses,: Remember to include any email addresses, phone numbers, or website links
Scams can happen to anyone. They’re not: Scams can happen to anyone. They’re not always easy to recognize and new ones are invented every day.
Share any details you may know so that p: Share any details you may know so that police can try to identify suspects.
Sorry, the page you were trying to view: Sorry, the page you were trying to view does not exist.
Tell us about it in your own words.
Tell us about your experience so we can: Tell us about your experience so we can stop it from happening again.
Tell us how the scam impacted you so tha: Tell us how the scam impacted you so that we can better support other people who are affected.
Think about including things such as:: Think about including things such as:
This site will change as we test ideas.
Warning! This is a prototype. It won't a: Warning! This is a prototype. It won't actually submit your report to the RCMP.
We will use this to send you a confirmat: We will use this to send you a confirmation email and to link your report to other reports in your area.
What happened is not your fault. Scammer: What happened is not your fault. Scammers use a number of techniques to get what they want.
What language they used to communicate: What language they used to communicate
What they promised, threatened, or stole: What they promised, threatened, or stole
Where they asked you to send things: Where they asked you to send things
Which app, website, or device you were u: Which app, website, or device you were using
Who the scammer claimed to be: Who the scammer claimed to be
You're not the only one affected by this: You're not the only one affected by this scam. Help protect others by telling us how the scam affected you.
Your report helps the RCMP learn about t: Your report helps the RCMP learn about these crimes and helps police across Canada catch cybercriminals.
banner.phaseText: This site will change as we test ideas.
banner.warning: Warning! This is a prototype. It won't actually submit your report to the RCMP.
confirmationPage.contactIntro: Provide your contact details so that we can send you a confirmation of your report.
confirmationPage.impactIntro: Tell us how the scam impacted you so that we can better support other people who are affected.
confirmationPage.scamIntro: Tell us about your experience so we can stop it from happening again.
confirmationPage.suspectIntro: Share any details you may know so that police can try to identify suspects.
confirmationPage.timeFrameIntro: If you can, give us an idea of when the scam took place so that police are able to look into it.
confirmationPage.title: Review your report
contactinfoPage.intro: We will use this to send you a confirmation email and to link your report to other reports in your area.
contactinfoPage.title: Leave your contact information
impactPage.detail: What was the impact of the scam?
impactPage.example: For example: the amount of money, the information taken, what else was affected
impactPage.intro: You're not the only one affected by this scam. Help protect others by telling us how the scam affected you.
impactPage.summary: Tell us more about how it impacted you.
impactPage.title: Impact caused by the scam
landingPage.intro: Scams can happen to anyone. They’re not always easy to recognize and new ones are invented every day.
landingPage.required0: Before you start, gather what you can about the scam:
landingPage.required3: Details on where it came from
landingPage.summary: Your report helps the RCMP learn about these crimes and helps police across Canada catch cybercriminals.
landingPage.title: Report a scam
nextStepsPage.helpResource1: Talk to someone and get support
nextStepsPage.helpResource2: Find tips to protect yourself in the future
nextStepsPage.nextStepDetail: The RCMP will analyze your report and combine it with others that are similar to help police across Canada track down cybercriminals.
nextStepsPage.otherReportOption1: Report directly to the place where the scam happened.
nextStepsPage.otherReportOption2: Report to your financial institution, if you lost money.
nextStepsPage.otherReportOption3: Report to the credit bureaus, <0>Equifax</0> and <1>TransUnion</1>, if your identity was stolen.
nextStepsPage.summary: We've sent you an email with a summary of your report. Your reference number is <0>#NC300234234</0>
nextStepsPage.title: Thank you for reporting
